title: BToS2 VC Lobby SK

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Stab your target at night.
- Disguise yourself as a target, dealing a Powerful attack. 2 uses.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you are roleblocked, you will attack the role blocker in addition to your target. You can not attempt to Disguise as your roleblocker.
- When you automatically kill a roleblocker, the roleblock attempt will fail.
- Roleblockers that target you will have their wills covered in blood, making it unreadable.
- At night, you may choose to spare roleblockers instead.
- When disguising, you must select a role to appear as. If successful, you will kill yourself, appearing as the role you selected and with your will appearing. Your target will become a "BToS2 VC Lobby SK" (5480), with the same amount of charges on the second ability as you had left.
- If you are not "successful", you will deal a standard Powerful attack.
- The criteria to be "successful are as follows:
\- You are not attacked by another source.
\- Your target is not attacked by another source.
\- Your target would die to a Powerful attack.

fields.name: Attributes (cont.):
fields.value: \- Your target is not Conversion Immune. (In the case of REFs, your target will remain appearing as their original role, as REFs will not deny a disguise.)

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who would oppose you.
